name: Repossession by Flavio Araujo Silva
description:
A Game Jam Submission for GBCGameJamFinal : Environment Impacts You
By Flavio Araujo Silva

Story: You are a ghost living in your own home all peacefully when suddenly some bots from the local bank have come to repossess your home. Its up to you to use the items left around your home to drive off these bolt heads off.

Controls:

WASD - MOVEMENT

MOUSE - CAMERA MOVEMENT

LEFT CLICK - PROCESS OBJECT

SPACE - FLOAT/OBJECT ABILITY
